intro: Banisteriopsis pulchra var. glabrata, commonly known as the smooth banisteria, is a climbing plant native to the Amazon rainforest. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its woody stems and compound leaves. The plant produces small, white flowers followed by orange-red berries that are edible. It is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits. Its botanical features make it a notable species in ecological and pharmacological studies.
